dcterms:creator: J.-L. Dillenseger
S. Laguitton
É. Delabrousse
dcterms:description: A dataset containing handwritten digits, where each image is of size 28x28 pixels and contains only one digit. The digits differ in writing style and stroke, making it suitable for matching tasks.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of 101 categories, where images are divided into two sets based on the coverage of the object in the image. It is used for object matching and registration tasks.
dcterms:title: Caltech-101

dcterms:creator: J.-L. Dillenseger
S. Laguitton
É. Delabrousse
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset developed for medical image registration, where ultrasound images are simulated from CT images. It is used for the registration of CT and ultrasound images.
dcterms:title: Ultrasound-CT dataset
